title: [PS3] Rogero_CEX_4.55_v1.00b_noBD
description: Following the noBD patch released by developers zecoxao & sguerrini97 where they were able to track down and extract from MiraLaTijera (MLT) CFW where the noBD patch originated from. Since then these patches have been ported to various other CFW versions. Already we have seen some CFW such as Rebug 4.46 and FERROX 3.55 / 4.55 with this patched applied. Now comes Rogero 4.55 v1.00 (CEX) with the noBD patch for broken/ missing BD drives and logic boards. This patch was applied by Joonie, see all the details in textfile of this release for console with a broken BD Drive
